mapper.insert: insert into ${entityName} (object_id, parent_id, parent_entity_id, start_date, end_date, `status`, permission_id, external_id) value (#{objectId}, #{parentId}, #{parentEntityId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{status}, #{permissionId}, #{externalId})
mapper.select:
select '${entityName}' entity_name, d.* from ${entityName} d
and d.parent_id = #{parentId} and d.`end_date` is null and d.object_id = #{objectId} and d.`end_date` is null and d.external_id = #{externalId}

select d.object_id from ${entityName} d left join ${entityName}_attribute a on a.object_id = d.object_id left join `${entityName}_value` v on v.attribute_id = a.id
(a.entity_attribute_id = #{i.entityAttributeId} and v.locale_id = #{j.localeId} and v.text = #{j.text})
limit 1
mapper.sql:
from ${object.entityName} d left join ${object.entityName}_attribute a on a.object_id = d.object_id left join `${object.entityName}_value` v on v.attribute_id = a.id
left join ${object.entityName}_attribute a${i} on a${i}.object_id = d.object_id left join `${object.entityName}_value` v${i} on v${i}.attribute_id = a${i}.id
left join ${object.entityName}_attribute sort_a on sort_a.object_id = d.object_id and sort_a.entity_attribute_id = #{sortProperty.value.entityAttributeId}
left join `${object.entityName}_value` sort_v on sort_v.attribute_id = sort_a.id
